DOC.brief_summary: This study aim comparison MultiHance dose 0.1 mmol/kg 0.05 mmol/kg Dotarem dose 0.1 mmol/kg brain tumor patient show superiority MultiHance .
DOC.detailed_description: This crossover study aim comparison 0.1 mmol/kg MultiHance 0.1 mmol/kg Dotarem , 0.05 MultiHance 0.1 mmol/kg Dotarem term diagnostic preference CE-MRI brain tumor patient show superiority MultiHance .
DOC.criteria: Are least 18 year age old Are able give write informed consent willing comply protocol requirement Are schedule undergo MRI Are willing undergo two MRI procedure within 14 day Have confirm highly suspect brain tumor ( ) ( primary secondary ) , determine : Clinical/neurological symptomatology ; Diagnostic testing , CT previous MRI examination ; Have recent brain surgery evaluate recurrence Are pregnant lactate female . Exclude possibility pregnancy : By test site institution within 24 hour prior start investigational product administration ; By history ( i.e. , tubal ligation hysterectomy ) ; Post menopausal minimum 1 year without menses Have know allergy one ingredients investigational product , history hypersensitivity metal Have congestive heart failure ( class IV accord classification New York Heart Association ) Have suffer stroke within year Have receive schedule receive contrast medium 24 hour precede 24 hour follow Exam 1 , 24 hour precede 24 hour follow Exam 2 Have receive schedule receive investigational compound and/or medical device within 30 day admission present study , 24 hour postadministration second investigational product Have moderatetosevere renal impairment , define Glomerular Filtration Rate ( GFR ) /estimated GFR < 45 mL/min Have previously enter study Have receive schedule one following : Surgical chemotherapeutic treatment within three week prior first examination two examination Initiation steroid therapy two examination Radiosurgery two examination Have contraindication MRI pacemaker , magnetic material ( i.e. , surgical clip ) condition would preclude proximity strong magnetic field Are suffer severe claustrophobia Have medical condition circumstance would significantly decrease chance obtain reliable data , achieve study objective , complete study and/or postdose followup examination
